coreCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/workspaces/auxeira-backend/backend/serv.serviceRawFile:
service: auxeira-backend
frameworkVersion: ^4.0.0
provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: provided
  region: us-east-1
  memorySize: 2048  # More memory for Solana
  timeout: 30
  environment:
    NODE_ENV: production
functions:
  api:
    image: 
      uri: ${aws:accountId}.dkr.ecr.${aws:region}.amazonaws.com/auxeira-backend:latest
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          # Remove cors: true from here
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          # Remove cors: true from here
